name: fitglue-web
description: FitGlue web frontend and Firebase Hosting configuration

scripts.build: npm run _fetch-plugins && npm run _build:static && npm run _build:app && npm run _merge
scripts.build:dev: npm run _fetch-plugins && npm run _build:static && vite build --mode development && npm run _merge
scripts.build:test: npm run _fetch-plugins && npm run _build:static && vite build --mode test && npm run _merge
scripts.serve: npm run build && npx firebase serve --only hosting
scripts._merge: cp -r static-dist/* dist/ && sh -c 'if [ -d dist/public ]; then cp -r dist/public/* dist/ && rm -rf dist/public; fi' && sh -c 'if [ -d dist/app ]; then mkdir -p dist/app-temp && mv dist/app/* dist/app-temp/ 2>/dev/null || true; mkdir -p dist/app && mv dist/app-temp/index.html dist/app/ && rm -rf dist/app-temp; fi'

author: James King
